meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin Schmidt Dylan Wint Sara Garnett Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6556.

td.p: Erin Schmidt, a freelance writer and editor from Mishawaka, Indiana
Dylan Wint, a neurologist and psychiatrist from Las Vegas, Nevada
Sara Garnett, a graduate student of zoology originally from Okemos, Michigan (whose 3-day cash winnings total $75,403)

tr.td: CHESS? YES!
3-LETTER WORDS
EXILED
SHOPPING ABBREV.
CELEBRITIES LOVE TV
"V" ARE THE WORLD

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
